Summary: I was taking pictures of the sunset when I noticed a strange hovering translucent object. I took photo and i then just vanished or disapeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Leakey, TX visiting for a couple days and decided to take a picture of the sunset on the evening of October 23, 2013. As I was taking the pic I noticed a cigar translucent shaped object hovering in the distance. I immediately took a picture of the object and it hovered in the same spot for about 5 minutes then just vanished in thin air.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Leakey
This sighting has never been favorited.
